name: Pit Dweller
description:
Huge credit to Ken Smith for making all the sprites.

Pit Dweller:

A 2D shooting game. You must defend yourself against waves of spiders and worms. Use the boxes and water to your advantage.

Control:

-Left mouse to shoot.

-A and D to move left and right.

-Space to dash

-W to jump

-1,2,3 to switch between pistol, machine gun, and laser.

Note: you can not shoot while swimming. Also ammo for machine gun and laser will regenerate in 5 seconds when you stop shooting.
